SummaryEnglish: The Russian writer Andrei Gorchakov (Oleg Yankovsky) travels to Italy to research the life of 18th-century Russian composer Pavel Sosnovsky, who lived there and committed suicide after his return to Russia. He and his comely interpreter Eugenia travel to a convent in the Tuscany countryside, to look at frescoes by Piero della Francesca. Andrei decides at the last minute that he does not want to enter.
